channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Two powerful, OLED-equipped gaming laptops are hundreds off
item.description: Whether you’re considering a 16-inch gaming laptop, or a more compact 14-inch model, there’s a deal with your name on it happening right now at Best Buy. The 2025 models of Acer’s Predator Helios Neo 16S and the Asus ROG Zephyrus G14 are hundreds off, although it’s the model with the bigger screen that is […]

item.title: 'Your data is public': Hacker warns victims after leaking 6.8 billion emails online
item.description: Someone posted 150GB of emails to the dark web, claiming to hold 6.8 billion unique email addresses.

item.title: Automattic planned to target 10 competitors with royalty fees, WP Engine claims in new filing
item.description: WP Engine claims Automattic was going to target more hosting companies with royalty fees.

item.title: A STI Fungus Is Making Itself Cozy in the US
item.description: More than 30 cases of TMVII have been documented in the Twin Cities metro area since last July.

item.title: Mutated Rats Reign in This Ooey-Gooey Clip From ‘Cold Storage’ (Exclusive)
item.description: Joe Keery ('Stranger Things') and Georgina Campbell ('Barbarian') confront an extreme workplace hazard in the sci-fi horror comedy, arriving February 13.

item.title: OpenAI’s President Gave Millions to Trump. He Says It’s for Humanity
item.description: In an interview with WIRED, Greg Brockman says supporting politicians who back AI is “bigger than the people that I happen to be employed with.”

item.title: Despite the first game's Xbox exclusivity deal, PlayStation is 'still our lead platform' says Squanch Games CEO as High on Life 2 launches this week
item.description: Squanch Games CEO Mike Fridley has said releasing High on Life 2 simultaneously on Xbox and PlayStation was a "no-brainer" following the first game's long Xbox exclusivity window.

item.title: Trump Just Blew American Climate Policy to Smithereens
item.description: President Trump and EPA Administrator Lee Zeldin announced the repeal of the endangerment finding, the legal bedrock for the agency's actions against planet-warming pollution.

item.title: Eufy’s midrange X10 Pro Omni robovac has fallen to its best-ever price
item.description: Spring doesn’t officially kick off until March 20th, but there’s something to be said about getting a head start on your spring cleaning. Lucky for you, Eufy’s X10 Pro Omni is currently on sale at Amazon, Walmart, and directly from Eufy (with promo code WS7DV2D5LF9F) for $449.99 ($450 off), matching its lowest price to date. […]

item.title: Israel Accuses Two Polymarket Bettors of Trading on Classified Military Operations
item.description: Perhaps we could stop and ask why you can bet on military operations in the first place.

item.title: AirPods Pro 3, batterie MagSafe Anker 621 et forfait Coriolis 5G : les 3 meilleurs bons plans tech de ce jeudi 12 février 2026
item.description: En ce jeudi frisquet de février, les bons plans tech sont de sortie, avec plusieurs promotions qui méritent le détour.

item.title: 'We believe the people responsible for defending the country should have access to the best tools available': OpenAI is giving the US military access to ChatGPT
item.description: OpenAI has agreed to let the US military use ChatGPT for "all lawful uses" without imposing technical restrictions.

item.title: Enjoy This POV of Getting Arrested at the Super Bowl—Courtesy of Smart Glasses
item.description: Thanks to smart glasses, POV content has gone fully off the rails.

item.title: Spotify says its best developers haven’t written a line of code since December, thanks to AI
item.description: Spotify credits Claude Code and its internal AI system Honk with speeding up development.

item.title: Howard Lutnick’s Epstein Island Visit Puts Spotlight on His Past Crypto Ties
item.description: Trust him?

item.title: Jeffrey Epstein might not have created /pol/, but he helped carry out its mission
item.description: On October 24th, 2011, Jeffrey Epstein was emailing back and forth with Boris Nikolic, a biotech venture capitalist who would later be named as a backup executor of Epstein's will. The two appeared to be discussing a meeting Nikolic had helped arrange between Epstein and "moot," the screen name for Christopher Poole, who created the […]

item.title: VPN deal of the week: You've got less than a week left to grab ExpressVPN at its lowest-ever price — here's the top ways to save right now
item.description: ExpressVPN has dropped its price to become one of the cheapest VPNs available right now. Here's how you can save

item.title: Surfshark VPN is offering up to 87 percent off two-year plans
item.description: Surfshark’s One plan is heavily discounted right now, with an 87-percent discount on the two-year package, plus three extra months. The promo price comes out to $2.29 per month, or $62 for the first 27 months. We’ve generally liked Surfshark as a straightforward, speedy service for everyday use, and it’s one of the picks in our guide to the best VPNs. In our Surfshark review, we found it delivered excellent speeds overall and reliably unblocked Netflix across most of our test servers, which makes this long-term deal worth a look if you want a VPN deal that also includes extras like antivirus, ...

item.title: Test OnePlus Pad Go 2 : une tablette pour se divertir sans se ruiner
item.description: Avec sa dalle LCD de 12,1 pouces et son processeur Mediatek Dimensity 7300 Ultra, la OnePlus Pad Go 2 est bien adaptée à une utilisation multimédia, voire ludique. De plus, elle est disponible en version Wi-Fi ou 5G.

item.title: Our Favorite TV Is Still Almost Half Off
item.description: Best Buy continues to sell the TCL QM6K for a staggering discount.

item.title: Android 17 : date de sortie, nouveautés, smartphones compatibles… tout ce qu’il faut savoir
item.description: Votre smartphone recevra-t-il Android 17 ? Calendrier de sortie, bêta et nouvelles fonctionnalités : voici tout ce qu'il faut savoir sur la prochaine version de l'OS de Google.

item.title: Somehow, Samsung May Make QD-OLED Monitors Even Better
item.description: Samsung's new ultrawide OLED monitor could be brighter than ever before.

item.title: How Razer’s $1,337 Boomslang Mouse Broke Me
item.description: It’s the classic 1999 Boomslang with the guts of a $170 gaming mouse and fewer features than you would think.

item.title: I can’t get enough of Spotify’s new About the Song feature — I’m learning things about my favorite albums that I never knew before
item.description: Since Spotify launched its About the Song tool, I haven't stopped reading every piece of background information on my favorite albums.

item.title: Scientists May Have Spotted the Soviet Union Lander That’s Been Missing for 60 Years
item.description: Luna 9 had a bouncy touchdown on the lunar surface in 1966, becoming the first spacecraft to land on the Moon.

item.title: “Pourquoi je ne recommanderais plus jamais une Tesla” : ces journalistes ont testé le Rivian R2 électrique et ont enfin trouvé un vrai concurrent au Tesla Model Y
item.description: Les premiers essais du Rivian R2 viennent de tomber. Cette voiture électrique était attendue de pied ferme. Et les avis ne déçoivent pas. On serait a priori face à la vraie concurrente de la Tesla Model Y. Enfin un SUV aussi pratique au quotidien que fun à conduire ?

item.title: A new version of OpenAI’s Codex is powered by a new dedicated chip
item.description: OpenAI calls the new coding tool the "first milestone" in its relationship with the chipmaker.

item.title: Scared of PC price hikes? HP's latest brainwave is renting you a gaming laptop rather than selling it — but the pricing looks as painful as the RAM crisis
item.description: HP offers 'gaming laptop as a service' where you never own the notebook, and just pay monthly — but I'm far from convinced.

item.title: OpenAI deploys Cerebras chips for 15x faster code generation in first major move beyond Nvidia
item.description: OpenAI on Thursday launched GPT-5.3-Codex-Spark, a stripped-down coding model engineered for near-instantaneous response times, marking the company's first significant inference partnership outside its traditional Nvidia-dominated infrastructure. The model runs on hardware from Cerebras Systems, a Sunnyvale-based chipmaker whose wafer-scale processors specialize in low-latency AI workloads.The partnership arrives at a pivotal moment for OpenAI. The company finds itself navigating a frayed relationship with longtime chip supplier Nvidia, mounting criticism over its decision to introduce adverti...

item.title: The Russo Brothers Are Still Being Weird About Those ‘Avengers: Doomsday’ Teasers
item.description: New quotes from the Marvel Studios directors are even more confusing than the last ones.

item.title: Aurora’s driverless trucks can now travel farther distances faster than human drivers
item.description: CEO Chris Urmson called it a “superhuman” moment, adding that Aurora’s trucks can now carry freight 1,000 miles in 15 hours — faster than what a human driver can legally accomplish.

item.title: Android Auto : Google Maps va enfin vous laisser faire ce réglage sans toucher à votre téléphone
item.description: Google Maps vous permet de personnaliser l'apparence de l'icône de votre véhicule depuis un moment, mais uniquement sur votre téléphone. Android Auto entend bien changer cela.

item.title: Good Luck, Have Fun, Don’t Die is a rollicking parable about this moment in tech
item.description: We are all guilty of pulling out our phones and doomscrolling through stressful headlines or mindnumbing videos when we should be doing anything else. We know it's bad, but we still do it because it's hard to resist when much of our time is spent living and working on our devices. And even though we […]

item.title: 1,200 Ubisoft workers strike in response to layoffs
item.description: At the end of last month, Ubisoft workers in the publisher’s native France threatened to strike in the wake of sweeping layoffs and cost-cutting measures. This week, they made good on those threats. According to GamesIndustry.biz, union members confirmed that at least 1,200 staff participated in the three-day strike, which was due to run from February 10 to February 12. While the strike action primarily took place in France, GamesIndustry.biz was told that Ubisoft’s Milan office also took part. The union Solidaires Informatique, which represents French workers from a number of companies in the...

item.title: Le Vision Pro accueille l’application qui aurait dû être là depuis le début
item.description: Deux ans après son lancement, le Vision Pro a finalement droit à une application YouTube. Jusqu'à présent, les utilisateurs du casque de réalité mixte d'Apple devaient se contenter de passer par un navigateur web. Avec une vraie app, ils auront enfin droit à une expérience native.

item.title: Des data centers dans l’espace : pourquoi ce projet fou devient réalité et pourrait pulluler à l’avenir
item.description: Et si l’endroit idéal pour installer les centres de données était dans l’espace ? L’idée peut sembler farfelue, mais elle intéresse pourtant plusieurs entreprises de la tech, dont des géants tels que Google.

item.title: The Pentagon Wants to Raw Dog the Latest AI Models on Classified Systems
item.description: Defense officials are pushing tech companies to loosen restrictions on their most powerful models as the military expands its use of AI.

item.title: Yes, you really can get 32GB of Kingston Fury RAM for $161 with this unmissable Ryzen 7 CPU bundle from Newegg
item.description: Save $509 on this Ryzen 7 9850X3D processor and 32GB DDR5 combo at Newegg, while stocks last.

item.title: The LG G5 OLED TV is the reference model I use to test 4K Blu-rays, and the best time to buy it is right now
item.description: As a TV, soundbar and 4K Blu-ray tester, it's important to have a good reference screen - and they don't get much better than the LG G5.

item.title: Mac mini M4 : le rapport performances/prix de ce PC de bureau (512 Go) noté 9/10 était déjà excellent, il l’est encore plus avec cette petite promo
item.description: Le Mac mini M4 d'Apple impressionne par la performance de sa puce, qui lui permet de ridiculiser bien des PC de bureau classiques. Compact et facilement transportable, ce miniordinateur est actuellement affiché à 886 euros au lieu de 949 euros chez Joybuy.

item.title: Top DOJ antitrust enforcer is out weeks before Live Nation trial
item.description: Gail Slater, the top antitrust enforcer at the Justice Department, announced Thursday that she has left her post, just weeks before the agency's next major tech monopoly trial against entertainment giant Live Nation is set to begin. "It is with great sadness and abiding hope that I leave my role as AAG for Antitrust today," […]

item.title: Say this instead of ‘please find attached’
item.description: Users on X were quick to suggest snarky alternatives to the work email cliché. Think about how many emails you receive each day. Then how many of those include the phrase “please find attached” in the body. One X user has made a plea to retire the phrase, a relic leftover from a time when business communication relied on typewritten letters posted in envelopes, which actually included attached documents to be found. ...

item.title: Les messages que Sophie Adenot a glissé dans son écusson et pourquoi le nom « Epsilon »
item.description: Pour sa mission scientifique, Sophie Adenot a choisi le nom « Epsilon » et un design tout aussi poétique pour son écusson. Entre mathématiques, astronomie, nature et exploration spatiale, partons à la découverte de ces multiples petits détails qui racontent le sens profond de cette mission...

item.title: China releases new rules to curb auto price war
item.description: The rules come after January passenger car sales dropped to 20% in China. China moved on Thursday to curb a fierce price war among automakers that has caused massive losses for the industry, after passenger car sales dropped nearly 20% in January from the year before, the fastest pace in almost two years.

item.title: I've played thousands of hours on PS5, and these are the DualSense controllers I most want to add to my collection
item.description: These lovely DualSense controllers are at the top of my personal wishlist.

item.title: Instagram chief Adam Mosseri testifies on social media addiction at landmark trial in L.A.
item.description: Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg is scheduled to take the stand next week. Adam Mosseri, the head of Meta’s Instagram, testified Wednesday during a landmark social media trial in Los Angeles that he disagrees with the idea that people can be clinically addicted to social media platforms.The question of addiction is a key pillar of the case, where plaintiffs seek to hold social media companies responsible for harms to children who use their platforms. Meta Platforms and Google’s YouTube are the two remaining defendants in the case, which TikTok and Snap have settled.At the core of the Los Angeles case ...

item.title: How to get F1TV with your Apple TV subscription
item.description: Last year Apple secured the exclusive rights to broadcast Formula 1 racing in the United States from 2026 to 2030. Apple TV subscribers can now watch every practice and qualifying session as well as every sprint and Grand Prix of a race weekend on the F1TV app by linking their Apple account. Right now, those with an existing F1TV subscription will still see an active status in their "my subscription" page on desktop that shows the plan's renewal date. However, after logging in via Apple with an Apple TV subscription, a second active F1TV subscription appears with an Apple TV logo and the label...
